**Glade: Building the Future of AI-Driven Gaming**

Welcome to **Glade**, a fresh player in the gaming industry aimed at revolutionizing how we experience video games with the power of artificial intelligence. Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Summer 2023 batch, Glade is positioned in the heart of San Francisco, bringing together a dynamic team of eight talented individuals.

Glade’s mission is clear: "Building the next generation of video games using AI." Their inaugural title, **Cursed Crown**, sets the stage for this ambitious vision. It’s an anime-inspired multiplayer ARPG (Action Role-Playing Game) that immerses players in the richly woven world of Alder. Here, gamers don’t just battle enemies; they engage in a deep narrative exploring cultural divides and bridging fractured regions through understanding and collaboration. The game is not merely about conquering foes; it’s also about uniting a divided land through meaningful interactions supported by responsive AI characters.

The company is tagged with keywords like **generative-ai**, **consumer**, **entertainment**, **gaming**, and of course, **AI**—highlighting its core focus areas and tech-driven approach. 

If you're intrigued by their journey and want to dive deeper, you can explore more about the team, the game, and future career opportunities on their website: [Glade Studio](https://gladestudio.ai/).

In a world where gaming aspirations often falter at the intersection of technology and creativity, Glade aims to seamlessly blend the two. Their commitment to cultural understanding as a gameplay mechanic is not just revolutionary; it's necessary in today's global landscape.

The future of gaming is here, and it’s built on the foundations of AI and unity—welcome to Glade.
